text:
I bought takeaway but the pizza sourdough crust was still chewy and flavourful albeit not hot or crispy anymore. Today, I tried the meat fiesta which was good but will try the other flavours in the future. I will also have the pizza at the kiosk the next time to compare whether any drastic difference.
They are using individual oven and can take  a long time to serve the pizza during peak hours.
Had a margherita pizza from here. Was blown away ðŸ¤¯ Amazing ingredients, splendid crust and piping hot right from the oven. 10/10 will come back multiple times in the future
Love their pizzas! They are operating as a kiosk with a small area for customers to sit down and eat, which is great coz the pizzas taste best when theyâ€™re fresh outta the oven.

Ordered the meat fiesta and pepperoni. The crust was worth mentioning, chewy and flavourful. Pepperoni was good too, I think they drizzled some hot honey on it. Meat fiesta would have been perfect if there was a punch flavour cutting through it, like a bbq sauce?

I would still order it again!
Dough is light and well fermented. Delicious, consistent, and with ingredients worth the prize. Perfect for a single serving!
